ILLENIUM, Tiësto and Above & Beyond to Headline New 3-Day ‘Decadence Festival’

Posted by Brittany Prevost on March 15, 2022

TICKETS

Just when we thought we had our summer plans locked, the masterminds behind the INK Entertainment Group dropped a surprise announcement of the ages! Get ready for this one ~ a brand-new three-day festival christened 'Decadence' will take place at CityView Toronto on June 30th, 2022, through July 2, 2022. 

Although the location is known as a drive-in, it is also home to countless events. The pandemic restrictions are also lifting; so, rest assured - this will be a standing event! Party goers can count on "unmatched views of the Toronto skyline" and a "238-foot stage"!

In addition to the beautiful venue, the organizers have billed some of the hottest names in the dance music scene! Get ready for special performances by your legendary headliners: Tiësto, ILLENIUM, and Above & Beyond. More artists will be also be announced shortly...

To our veteran ravers, you may recognize the concept as this upcoming festival is actually a revamped version of the Decadence events previously held at The Guvernment Nightclub by the INK Entertainment Group. That being said, you can count on an incredible production!

Tickets went on sale on March 10, 2022; but you can still get yours here. Don't sleep on this! We're thrilled to see events making a comeback - but we never imagined we'd be getting new ones, especially of this caliber. Bring on the summer - we're ready to party! 

Written By Brittany Prevost
